column4: hi, i have two problems with ubuntu that i'd like to solve. It seems to be able to go to 1600x1200 for me which is great, but it's stuck at 60hz no matter what resolution I choose. How can  I fix that?
Know the exact Hsync&Vsync specs for your monitor and edit /etc/xorg.conf in section 'monitor'. Then you'll be able to select higher vsync in Display-Properties
is it normal that I don't have xorg.conf in that foldeR?
